revision.text: ==Zoogocho Zapotec== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|zpq|nci|Caxtīllān|t=Spain}}, from {{der|zpq|es|Castilla|t=Castile}}. ===Adjective=== {{head|zpq|adjective}} # {{l|en|white}} {{gloss|color}} ====Derived terms==== {{col3|zpq |beṉeꞌ xtil |cant xtil |dižaꞌxtil |plomxtil |tas platw xtil |xtil güeꞌeṉ |yaxtil |yaxtil |yetextil |zaxtil }} ===References=== * {{R:Long & Cruz 2000|pages=295–296}}
